content: introducing AI people a generative AI sandbox that enables players to experience interactions with autonomous NPCs through text or voice input there are no fixed plots NPC's choices and emotions craft emerging stories they adapt to players the environment and fellow NPCs while maintaining consistency through long-term memory Unleash Your creativity with the integrated editor shaping NPC's lives and crafting unlimited narratives or enjoy pre-made and community-made stories driven by Ai and user content each game session is a fresh original constantly evolving narrative Journey the players can choose between online and local large language models to power the NPCs what story will you create today
title: AI People | Autonomous NPC Interactions
author: NVIDIA GeForce

key_facts: AI People is a generative AI sandbox for interactive storytelling.
Players interact with autonomous NPCs using text or voice input.
NPCs have dynamic choices and emotions that influence story development.
Stories emerge organically based on player actions, environment, and NPC interactions.
NPCs maintain consistency through long-term memory across sessions.
The platform includes an integrated editor for customizing NPC lives and narratives.
Users can create unlimited original stories using the built-in editor.
Pre-made and community-created stories are available for play.
Stories are driven by AI and user-generated content.
Each game session generates a fresh, evolving narrative.
Players can choose between online and local large language models.
Local LLMs enable offline gameplay with NPC intelligence.
Online LLMs provide access to more advanced AI capabilities.
The system supports persistent character development over time.
NPC behavior adapts in real-time to player decisions.
No fixed plots or predetermined storylines exist.
User creativity is central to shaping narrative outcomes.
Interactions are non-linear and continuously evolving.
Long-term memory ensures continuity in NPC personalities and relationships.
Voice input is supported for immersive interaction with NPCs.
key_opinions: The lack of fixed plots enhances creative freedom for players.
Autonomous NPCs make the experience feel more lifelike and engaging.
The integrated editor empowers users to become storytellers.
Community-made stories add rich diversity to the narrative pool.
Local LLMs offer better privacy and control during gameplay.
Online LLMs deliver superior narrative depth and responsiveness.
Emerging stories feel more authentic due to adaptive NPC behavior.
The platform successfully blends AI-driven content with user creativity.
Long-term memory significantly improves narrative coherence.
Voice input enhances immersion compared to text-only interaction.
key_datapoints: Game sessions generate constantly evolving narratives.
NPCs adapt to player input, environment, and other NPCs.
Supports both text and voice-based player interactions.
Users can switch between online and local LLMs.
Integrated editor enables full customization of NPC lives.
Community-made stories are available alongside pre-made ones.
Narratives are driven by AI and user content.
Each session produces a unique, original story.
NPCs maintain consistent personalities through long-term memory.
Player choices directly influence story direction and outcomes.
